subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Oakland appears to have reached a four-year, $36 million contract agreement with the Cuban defector Yoenis Cespedes, making him the team’s highest-paid player.
snippet: Oakland appears to have reached a four-year, $36 million contract agreement with the Cuban defector Yoenis Cespedes, making him the team’s highest-paid player.
